# Canadian Government Tender Announcement
## Project Title: S77 Heating Modifications Steam to Hot Water
## Notice Type: Request for Proposal

### Important Dates

Published Date: August 17, 2022
Closing Date: September 16, 2022, at 14:00
Site Visit: August 25th and 26th, 2022, at 9:00 a.m.

### Overview

The National Research Council Canada is seeking a contractor to undertake a project involving the modification of the existing heating system and its conversion from steam to hot water at Building S77, located at 100 Sussex Dr, Ottawa. The successful contractor will be responsible for ensuring that all work is completed in compliance with the procurement requirements and relevant regulations.

### Mandatory Site Visit

The site visit is mandatory for all bidders, and at least one representative from each bidding company must attend. The site visit will take place on August 25th and 26th, 2022, at 9:00 a.m. at Building S77, Main Entrance, 100 Sussex Dr, Ottawa. Bidders who are unable to attend the site visit will be considered non-responsive and will not be given an alternative appointment.

### Security Requirements

The contractor must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) and have each personnel requiring access to sensitive work sites hold a valid RELIABILITY STATUS. Compliance with the Security Requirements Checklist and the Industrial Security Manual is mandatory.

### Additional Requirements

The contractor must provide a valid WSIB certificate and comply with the Office of the Procurement Ombudsman and the Clause for Solicitation Documents and Regret Letters for Unsuccessful Bidders.

### Contact Information

* Tania Backes, Contracting Authority, at [Tania.Backes@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:Tania.Backes@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca) or 613-410-3834.
* Allan Smith, Departmental Representative, at [Allan.Smith@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:Allan.Smith@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca) or 613-852-1357.
